answers.answer: Thanks for using the forum.Is your blood sugar well controlled on the medications? Fluctuations in blood sugar can lead to "feeling weak". Are you monitoring your diet? If you are not managing your diet appropriately you can be having peaks and drops in your blood sugar making you feel weak.I recommend speaking with your doctor about your concerns. If your blood sugar is not well controlled, your doctor will be able to help you make the dietary, lifestyle, and medication changes needed to feel yourself again.Cathy

It would help if you gave us info.  All you have given us is your age, your diabetic, your meds, and you dont feel good (week).  Since diabetes is ALL about blood sugar (BG) what are your BG numbers? what do you eat? do you exrecise?what are your BG numbers?
Metformin it takes time for ur body to get use to tht medicine but talk with ur doctor
